product_name: Metolius Equalizer with Built-In Storage Pocket
long_description: The Metolius Equalizer with Built-In Storage Pocket makes it easy to equalize multiple anchor points at a belay station. Equalizer can be used to equalize 2- or 3-point anchors. Keep the Equalizer neatly stowed in the built-in storage pocket when it's not in use; storage pocket has instructions printed on the outside to help you set up a solid anchor. Made from 16mm-wide Dyneema Monster Sling webbing. Equalizer is rated to 22kN when used as a looped sling or a 2- or 3-point anchor; rated to 18kN when used end-to-end. Metolius Equalizer with Built-In Storage Pocket is available in 2 lengths: 10 ft. and 15 ft.
short_description: The Metolius Equalizer with Built-In Storage Pocket makes it easy to equalize multiple anchor points at a belay station.
